About me

My name Denis

Pentesting and web development - my tandem is unrivaled!
I break down walls of insecurity and build amazing online worlds.

My advantage? An obsessive attention to detail, an inability to leave
a task unfinished, and a punctuality that permeates every aspect of my work.

How can I be useful?

Education and courses

Everest Acdemy and OVS

Toronto, ON (2015-2021)
Everest Academy is dedicated to the challenge of the climb, which results in extraordinary academic, athletic and leadership achievement in our student-athletes.

Udemy

Курсы по Web-разработке
This course is aimed at detailed training in website creation. In it I studied HTML, CSS, JS, Gulp, Git, BEM Methodology.

Stanford CS193p

Developing Apps for iOS
Stanford's CS193p course, Developing Applications for iOS, explains the fundamentals of how to build applications for iPhone and iPad using SwiftUI.

Harvard CS50

Course
This is CS50x , Harvard University's introduction to the intellectual enterprises of computer science and the art of programming for majors and non-majors alike, with or without prior programming experience.

Penetration test

CyberTeam
The course gave me knowledge on how to conduct internal and external pentests (Black/Gray/White Box), attack networks, WEB sites, operating systems and local devices.
Skills

What do I use at work?

HTML5
It is what creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure for your product
CSS3
This styling language allows me to create absolutely any look and feel for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product specifically for your purposes
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - “brains” that will perform actions that the user cannot see
Mongo.db
This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data
Swift
This is a modern and high-level programming language, it is designed for developing applications for iOS, macOS and other Apple platforms.
